subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chicago’s victory on Saturday was aided by Tyrus Thomas and Joakim Noah, who became Bulls as part of the trade that sent Eddy Curry to the Knicks in 2005.
snippet: Chicago’s victory on Saturday was aided by Tyrus Thomas and Joakim Noah, who became Bulls as part of the trade that sent Eddy Curry to the Knicks in 2005.
